name: Race Through The Sky
description:
Race against the clock through the sky! What could make this more intense? The platforms fall after you land on them! You'd better be quick!

This game was created for the WeeklyGameJam week 110: Floating Sky Islands

This game was made in a week, so it may have some bugs/issues. Feel free to tell me about them in the comments.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • WASD to move. Space to jump.
  • Shift to run.
  • Left Click (Mouse 0) to use the exit and proceed to the next level.
  • Right Click (Mouse 1) to restart level at end screen.
